title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 July 2009 - XWiki
content:

Kristyna - (13/07/2009 16:46): Hi, I'm new to xwiki ... I'm using xwiki in multilingual mode and is there any posibility if I edit default page (let say in english) to see/import these updates in other languages?   
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 16:46): Not directly  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 16:46): You could write a plugin that does that, though  
Kristyna - (13/07/2009 16:49): aha, ok ... thanks for answer :-)

rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 22:57): Hi out there. Please, anybody could help me with a com.xpn.xwiki.objects.LargeStringProperty error in a old XWiki installation? Thanks in advance!  
vmassol left at 22:57 ()  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 22:59): Hi rrodriguez  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 22:59): What's up?  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:00): Hi Sergiu! Thanks for being always there!  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:00): :)  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:00): I do need to change a couple of user passwords in a old 1.3.8295 installation  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:01): yes, it is the one that I have to updated urgently! :-)  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 23:01  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:01): I am getting  a [com.xpn.xwiki.objects.LargeStringProperty# exception  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:01):  Row was updated or deleted by another transaction  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:01): 1.3 is like windows 98...  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:02): :-(  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:02): sorry for bothering you with this issue!  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:02): Hey, no problem  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:02): I keep trying to get THE PROJECT for XWiki :-)  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:03): Do you do this manually (using the GUI), or using a script?  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:03): But I am failing so far!  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:03): I am using ?xpage=passwd  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:09): If an user try to change his/her password from the Change Password option in his/her user page, he/she gets a Wrong username message in addition to the detailed error information box  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:12): Every user?  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:17): yeap  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:18): at least, I've tried a dozen of them  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:18): K  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:18): Do you have a public URL?  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:18): yeap, you have an account there  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:19): http://environmentalchange.net  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:19): K  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:23): Yep, my account still works :)  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:23): Great!  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:24): Hm, changing the password works fine  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:24): ummm indeed  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:24): Almost...  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:25): You have not used your password for months  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:25): Now I can't login anymore...  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:25): oops  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:26): do you want I create a new account for you?  
sdumitriu - (13/07/2009 23:26): Yes, please  
rrodriguez - (13/07/2009 23:31): I've sent the username and password to your Gmail account  
jumpkick\_\_ left at 23:41 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))
